title: Cathie Wood's ARK funds sell nearly $100 million worth of Tesla stock after earnings
text: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest sold nearly $100 million worth of Tesla TSLA, +3.23% shares after the electric vehicle maker's well-received first-quarter results. The flagship ARK Innovation ETF ARKK, -4.97% sold $70 million worth of Tesla stock.

title: Tesla Record Quarter Helps Pare Consumer Discretionary ETF Losses
text: Tesla (NasdaqGS: TSLA) rallied Thursday on record quarterly profits, paring some losses in the consumer discretionary sector-related exchange traded funds. On Thursday, the Consumer Discretionary Select Sector SPDR (NYSEArca: XLY) fell 1.0%, the Vanguard Consumer Discretionary (NYSEArca: VCR) dropped 1.3%, and the Fidelity MSCI Consumer Discretionary Index (NYSEArca: FDIS) was down 1.3%.

title: These 12 manufacturers can help investors capitalize on the U.S. 'industrial renaissance,' Cramer says
text: "The United States has been reclaiming its industrial preeminence in sector after sector after sector," the "Mad Money" host said.

title: Tesla Is Extending Lead In EV 'Arms Race' But Risks Remain: 4 Analysts React To Record Q1
text: Electric vehicle giant Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) reported record revenue, vehicle deliveries, operating profits and operating margins in the first quarter. Analysts reacted to the earnings report with several raising their price targets and outlook.

title: Tesla share price forecast after Q1 results
text: Tesla,Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) shares are advancing after the company reported better than expected first-quarter results and announced plans to grow its manufacturing capacity as quickly as possible. title: Expert opinion: Tesla is a stock of the decade
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) is the “stock of the decade”, says MarketRebellion.com's Jon Najarian after the EV maker reported strong results for its fiscal first quarter last night. title: TSLA Stock Can Take Out New Highs Because Giga Shanghai Is ‘Coming Back With a Vengeance'
text: Elon Musk laid out plans to keep scaling vehicle production on the Tesla Q1 earnings call. This is great news for TSLA stock.

title: Tesla Teases A Custom Robotaxi, Are They Crazy?
text: Tesla previously announced a brilliant plan to take off-lease Teslas and turn them into robotaxis, something almost nobody else could do. But now they may take (or add) a new direction with a custom, low-cost robotaxi.

title: Tesla Just Posted Record Quarterly Profit — Does Your Portfolio Need EV Exposure?
text: High energy prices have reignited positive clean energy sentiment. Tesla Inc. shares surged in premarket trading after the electric vehicle company posted its highest quarterly profit to date; the stock rose 7.1% before the opening bell on Thursday.

title: The Ratings Game: Tesla earnings ‘strong,' but Wall Street ‘not willing to bet on' latest robotaxi vehicle
text: Tesla Inc.'s record quarterly earnings got praise from Wall Street, with the stock rallying more than 7% Thursday and analysts voicing just a few concerns about the ramp ahead for the EV maker's newest factories.

title: Is It Too Late to Buy Tesla?
text: A record first quarter could be just the start of Tesla's next leg of growth.

title: Tesla's lush profit margin raises sustainability doubts in Wall Street
text: Tesla Inc's eye-popping profit margin has raised doubts among Wall Street analysts if the company would be able to keep at it amid rising commodity costs and higher expenses to increase production.

title: Why Tesla Shares Took Off Today
text: The latest quarterly report from Tesla didn't have any blemishes.

title: Tesla Stock Soars After Top- and Bottom-Line Beat
text: Electric vehicle (EV) maker Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) finally released its highly anticipated  first-quarter earnings report , and the turnout was much better than expected.

title: Tesla (TSLA) Delivers 5th Consecutive Earnings Beat in Q1
text: Tesla (TSLA) impresses investors with a stellar Q1 show, wherein both sales and profits top estimates. The EV giant reports a record automotive gross margin of 32.9%.

title: What Cramer is watching Thursday — Tesla up big, airlines bounce back, Disney's dilemma
text: Apple, Amazon and Procter & Gamble are among the Club names making news Thursday.

title: US stocks climb as Tesla leads strong earnings news with Fed chief Powell due to speak
text: The tech-heavy Nasdaq jumped more than 1.7% after Tesla crushed first-quarter earnings estimates despite supply-chain snags.

title: Will Tesla Stock Gain Post Q1 Results?
text: Tesla has already reported its delivery figures for the first quarter, noting that total deliveries for Q1 stood at 310,048, marking an increase of about 68% versus last year, driven by surging sales of its Model 3 and Y vehicles and a recovery in Model S and X sales, after the company paused pro.

title: Why Tesla Shares Are Trading Higher Today
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) shares are trading higher Thursday after the company reported better-than-expected financial results.  Tesla said first-quarter revenue grew 81% year-over-year to $18.76 billion, which beat the $17.76 billion estimate, according to data from Benzinga Pro.

title: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) Stock Hits Four Figures Once Again
text: Was yesterday the last time shares of Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) traded below $1,000, at least for the foreseeable future? It will be a while before that's confirmed but they're certainly looking good for it right now.

title: Futures climb after strong results from Tesla
text: U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday as heavyweight Tesla surged on strong results and United Airlines predicted a surprise profit in its current quarter, boosting shares of other carriers.

title: Elon Musk just unlocked $23 billion worth of Tesla stock options — but he can't sell the shares for 5 years
text: The Tesla CEO, who is trying to pull together $39 billion to take Twitter private, won't see an immediate influx of cash from his new batch of options.

title: Tesla jumps 7% after crushing Q1 estimates despite supply-chain snags, and as Elon Musk promises a robotaxi within 2 years
text: CEO Elon Musk said Tesla's Shanghai Gigafactory is "coming back with a vengeance," signaling his confidence in future output.

title: US stock futures rise after Tesla reports blow-out earnings and investors await further clues from Fed Chair Powell
text: Tesla beat analyst expectations by reporting higher margins, with quarterly revenue rising 80% year-on-year to $18.7 billion.
